      • getAdVO

        public <VO extends AdVO> VO getAdVO(java.lang.Class<VO> voType,
                           Ad ad,
                           boolean useAdFields,
                           boolean useMemberFields,
                           boolean onlyForAdSearchMemberFields)
        Description copied from interface: AdService
        Returns an AdVO for the given ad
        Specified by:
        getAdVO in interface AdService
        Parameters:
        voType - The VO type to return
        useAdFields - If true, the VO will be filled with the ad fields.
        useMemberFields - If true, the VO will be filled with member fields based on the onlyForAdSearchMemberFields.
        onlyForAdSearchMemberFields - Only applies when useMemberFields is true. If true, the VO will be filled only with ad search member fields. If false all member fields will be returned.
